column4:
du -h cpnet-out/*/*/dataset.pkl | sort -h The dataset size may be more or less than the raw size because we add a `target` but remove GT/TRA and GT/SEG annotations.
Also, the patches may overlap.
du -hsc ../rawdata/isbi_train/* | sort -h size on disk (including 01 and 02)
datasets sorted by size on disk
the diagonal elements of the Gaussian covariance matrix for the kernel shape
is every object in each image fully annotated?
start and end time tuple e.g. (0, 100)
How much to (anisotropically) downscale the raw images?  Typically, we downscale until the average cell size is slightly larger than the kernel equipotential line at 0.5
